isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - ENGINE ELECTRICAL - Engine Sensors and Valves - Camshaft Position (CMP) Sensor

svcproc.title: Camshaft Position (CMP) Sensor
svcproc.para: The CMP sensor, a magnetic pickup sensor, indicates camshaft speed and position.

The CMP sensor sends a pulsed signal to the ECM when a single peg on the camshaft rotates past the CMP sensor once during each revolution of the camshaft. The ECM calculates camshaft speed and position from CMP signal frequency.
The CMP sensor is installed in the front left side of the crankcase.

note.para: This long sensor measures camshaft speed and position for INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 and VT 275 diesel engines; However, for INTERNATIONAL® DT 466, DT 570, and HT 570 diesel engines, this sensor measures crankshaft speed and position, not camshaft speed and position.
